item.title: SeaChat Release History
item.description: 11/07/2024 # New Features and Improvements # Custom GPT Tools Result Display Options: Users can now select how results from custom GPT tools appear in webchat â€” either displayed in cards or as plain text in the Edit Custom GPT Tools page. New SeaChat Conversation Handling Mode: Users can choose how chats with customers are managed, the three modes are: Hybrid Mode: The AI agent handles interactions initially, but users can request a live agent transfer when needed.
